title: WARDRUNA, TESSERACT, CLOWN CORE, LEPROUS & More Announced For ArcTanGent Festival 2025
description: Plus Slift, Arab Strap, Green Lung, Envy, and more! The post WARDRUNA, TESSERACT, CLOWN CORE, LEPROUS & More Announced For ArcTanGent Festival 2025 appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: Plus Slift, Arab Strap, Green Lung, Envy, and more!
text: ArcTanGent 2025 is set to take place between August 13 and 16 in Bristol, UK and the lineup is totally insane. ArcTanGent has announced new headliners Tesseract and Wardruna alongside some new openers like Clown Core, Leprous, Slift, Arab Strap, Green Lung, Envy, and way more! Get all your information and tickets here. "To have Wardruna, a Main Stage headliner, closing off the Wednesday night of ArcTanGent 2025 truly cements this as our biggest year yet," wrote ArcTanGent organizers. "If you can make it to ATG a day early, a 4-Day ticket is now a no brainer. Not to mention TesseracT headlining Saturday night alongside the new additions of Clown Core, Mew, Arab Strap, Envy, Green Lung and tonnes more across the whole weekend. You're not going to want to miss a second of this weekend – FOMO is an understatement." html:
ArcTanGent 2025 is set to take place between August 13 and 16 in Bristol, UK and the lineup is totally insane. ArcTanGent has announced new headliners Tesseract and Wardruna alongside some new openers like Clown Core, Leprous, Slift, Arab Strap, Green Lung, Envy, and way more! Get all your information and tickets here.

"To have Wardruna, a Main Stage headliner, closing off the Wednesday night of ArcTanGent 2025 truly cements this as our biggest year yet," wrote ArcTanGent organizers.

"If you can make it to ATG a day early, a 4-Day ticket is now a no brainer. Not to mention TesseracT headlining Saturday night alongside the new additions of Clown Core, Mew, Arab Strap, Envy, Green Lung and tonnes more across the whole weekend. You're not going to want to miss a second of this weekend – FOMO is an understatement."
